RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 11100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE NOVEMBER 2. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 2 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Winners Since November 2, 2022 Preferred)(Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUPPLY CHAIN stalked the pace three wide into the far turn, made the lead near the five sixteenths pole, set the balance of the pace, shook clear under right handed urging before the furlong marker and lasted under left handed urging. GILES reserved early, closed with a burst of speed inside the winner through the stretch and finished clear for second. PARADE GRAND set a pressured pace along the inside into the far turn, altered course to the five path bumping MORE THAN GOOD at the top of the stretch then was outfinished. EXALTED JOY went evenly. MORE THAN GOOD pressed the pace two wide for six furlongs, was bumped in upper stretch then weakened. ARTEMUS EAGLE was no factor. LOOK AWAY was outrun. CANDY CRUSHEM close up four wide, faltered in the stretch. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN AND AFTER REVIEW DISQUALIFIED PARADE GRAND FOR INTERFERENCE WITH MORE THANT GOOD AT THE TOP OF THE STRETCH AND PLACED HIM FIFTH.

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Parade Grand
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, altered course 5path, bumped 3/16pole

ENTRY.NAME: More Than Good
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and Romero Juan
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, bumped 3/16pole, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Look Away
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Supply Chain
ENTRY.OWNER: Bernardini Jay P Burnsworth Richard and Buyea Kristina
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3w, assumed command far turn, shook clear, lasted

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Fergus Galvin, Tony Holmes & Sarah Holmes

ENTRY.NAME: Exalted Joy
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Giles
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, closed fast inside rivals, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Candy Crushem
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, 4 wide, faltered lane

ENTRY.NAME: Artemus Eagle
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 53. Maiden Claiming Purse 10500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NATURE OFTHE BEAST sped to the lead soon after the start, set all the pace under pressure, turned back a strong bid from the runner up near the furlong marker and proved best in a game effort under left handed urging. WHEN IN ROME was a forward factor from the start along the rail, lacked room on the turn, shifted out five wide before the quarter pole, drew on even terms for the lead with the winner at the furlong marker then was denied. LEAVENWORTH void of early speed, swung wide and closed a gap late in the middle of the racetrack. HEART OF AN ANGEL pressed the pace two wide into the stretch then weakened. ANGEL'S SOUPERSTAR pressed the early pace three wide and was through after a half. LIGHTNING CASHES had speed from the start, offered a mild bid four wide nearing the quarter pole then came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Nature Ofthe Beast
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick lead, set pressured pace, no breathers, repulsed bid,gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Leavenworth
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, swung wide, late gain, mid track

ENTRY.NAME: When in Rome
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside, no room turn, altered 5wide, loomed1/8p, denied

ENTRY.NAME: Lightning Cashes
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide bid turn, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Heart of an Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Angel's Souperstar
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 21600. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 2 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Races Where Entered For$8,000 O r Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DANZA MAGIC chased the leader two wide into the stretch, surged late under left handed urging three wide and got up in the final strides. OUT FOR FUN saved ground, rallied along the rail under right handed urging to make the lead past the sixteenth pole and just missed hanging on. LADY FORTUNE sprinted to a clear lead soon after the start, set the pace until deep stretch then was outfinished while two wide. FABULOUS CLOWN trailed into the stretch, swung wide, and closed a gap late in the middle of the racetrack. PRICELESS PICTURE failed to menace. BODE'S ROSE offered a mild bid three wide midway on the turn then failed to sustain that bid. MERE BAG OF SHELLS was a forward factor three wide into the stretch and faded late. BEAUTIFUL LASS had good early speed along the inside and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Beautiful Lass
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed turn, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Fortune
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, set pace late stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Danza Magic
ENTRY.OWNER: Yoder Susan and Rivera Alan Yahir
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide, surged late 3 wide, up in final strides,

ENTRY.NAME: Mere Bag of Shells
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 3-2wide, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Out for Fun
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, rallied rail, led late, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Fabulous Clown
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, swung wide, late gain, mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Bode's Rose
ENTRY.OWNER: Pocket Aces Racing LLC and Susan Anderson Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Priceless Picture
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 15400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 2 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GILLIGAN never far back, rallied four wide through the turn to make the lead at the top of the stretch then widened the balance of the trip to win as much the best under brisk handling. OVERBEARING away alertly, had good early speed two wide, dropped back on the turn, shifted to the five path entering the stretch then came on again late under strong handling to finished second best. MUTUAL CONFIDENCE pressed the pace two wide into the stretch and was outfinished. BOURBON OVER ICE trailed into the stretch and found his best stride late three wide. GEHRIG set a pressured pace along the inside into the stretch and weakened late. DIAMONDS ENJOY pressed the pace four then three wide into the stretch then weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Gehrig
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, top lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Over Ice
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, best stride late,

ENTRY.NAME: Overbearing
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 2 wide, dropped back turn, shifted 5path, came again,

ENTRY.NAME: Mutual Confidence
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Gilligan
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, rallied 4 wide turn, drew off, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Diamonds Enjoy
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 4-3wide, weakened stretch,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 2 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UPTOWN GUY prompted the pace two wide for three furlongs, made the lead, set the balance of the pace and won under right handed urging. QUANTUM THEORY never far back, rallied through the stretch in the seven path and got up for second. SILVER MATT was in a bit tight soon after the start then rallied determinedly along the rail through the stretch. CONSIDER ME stalked the early pace, loomed boldly four wide midway on the turn then was outfinished. ON HIS TOES went evenly. UNCAPTURED LYON stalked the pace three wide into the stretch then faded. GOTIGER SPECIAL was no factor. LAND REMEMBERED was outrun. DAY IN THE COUNTRY was no threat. FLEET RUN failed to menace. GIZMO'S MISSION set the pace along the inside for three furlongs, had speed into the stretch then stopped. THE RIDER OF SILVER MATT LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF QUANTUM THEORY FOR ALLGED INTERFERENCE AT THE START, AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS UPHELD THE ORIGINAL ORDER OF FINISH.

ENTRY.NAME: Gizmo's Mission
ENTRY.COMMENT: early pace inside, stopped lane

ENTRY.NAME: Uptown Guy
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2 wide, took charge 3/8 pole, edged clear, right urging

ENTRY.NAME: Fleet Run
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Silver Matt
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight early, finished well, rail, jockey claimed foul,

ENTRY.NAME: Quantum Theory
ENTRY.OWNER: Bernardini Jay P Burnsworth Richard and Buyea Kristina
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, late rally 7path, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Day in the Country
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Uncaptured Lyon
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Gotiger Special
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Consider Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked early, loomed boldly 4 wide turn, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Land Remembered
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: On His Toes
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 100. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 30300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED SINCE FEBRUARY 2 OR CLAIMING PRICE $40,000. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 2 Allowed 2 lbs. Cl aiming Price $40,000 (Races Where Entered For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Highest Earnings 2022-2023 Preferred)(Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CARILLO was bumped at the start, railed into the far turn, swung out to the middle of the racetrack entering stretch, responded with a burst of speed under right handed urging to make the lead past the furlong marker and widened rapidly to win as much the best. DOWNTOWN CONNECTOR bore out at the start bumping the winner, was unhurried, rallied four then three wide through the stretch and finished clear for second. HUNTER SCOTT set a pressured pace along the inside for a half, gave up a narrow lead, came on again to regain a slight advantage along the rail in upper stretch then was outfinished. OUTLIER unhurried while settling outside, loomed boldly three wide nearing the quarter pole then weakened. STATESBORO pressed the pace two wide for a half, gained a narrow advantage, set the pace to the top of the stretch then was used up. AYE AYE SIR pressed the pace for four and one half furlongs, stopped abruptly on the far turn, was eased in upper stretch and walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Hunter Scott
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, headed, came again rail, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Statesboro
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, led, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Downtown Connector
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out, bumped start, rallied 4-3wide, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Carillo
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, circled field, full of run, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Outlier
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Aye Aye Sir
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, stopped 2nd turn, eased, walked off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 25900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 2 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Races Where Entered For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weigh t Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RAINBOW SHIP broke in full stride to set all the pace and drew off through the stretch under mild right handed urging. CROSSED UP stalked the pace three wide, had a mild late rally while drifting to the eight path and finished clear for second. HIGH FIRE slow early, swung wide and found her best stride late while angled in from the seven to the four path. APPEALING SENORITA chased the winner down the backstretch, moved closer two wide on the turn then came up empty. TWERK failed to menace. POWER BANKER close up along the inside early, was through after a half. SOLE FACTOR had good early speed five wide and gave way in the stretch. PENNY SHOTS stumbled at the start and trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Appealing Senorita
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, middle move, 2 wide, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Power Banker
ENTRY.COMMENT: close inside, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Crossed Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3 wide, mild rally late drifted 8path, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Sole Factor
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 5 wide, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Rainbow Ship
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, drew off, right handed urging,

ENTRY.NAME: Twerk
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: High Fire
ENTRY.OWNER: Boots N Bikinis LLC and Jones Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, swung wide, best stride late, angled in,

ENTRY.NAME: Penny Shots
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled start, trailed,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 2 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: O SHAUGHESEY pressed the pace two wide for a half, made the lead, set the balance of the pace and finished full of run under right handed urging to win going away in the six path. WORTHERWEIGHTNGOLD saved ground through the turn, altered course to the eighth path at the top of the stretch then rallied for second. LADY LOTTIE unhurried early, swung wide and closed a gap late in the nine path through the stretch. MUSICMANSANDY hopped at the start, stalked the early pace, offered a mild bid three wide into the stretch then was outfinished. NO TWOWAYSABOUTIT was no factor. SHEZ SHACKED UP away alertly, set the pace along the inside for a half then gave way. CAUSE OF LOVE trailed.

ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace 1/4 pole, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Wortherweightngold
ENTRY.OWNER: Fairwinds Farm and Shafer, Steve D.
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground through turn altered 8path, rallied for second

ENTRY.NAME: O Shaughesey
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2 wide, took over 1/4 pole, full of run, going away
